basics.name: Ricardo Casares
basics.label: Full Stack Human
basics.summary: A web craftsman, passionate about the Internet and new technologies.

work.summary: Leading a cross-functional agile team with varying levels of experience to deliver mission-critical services and components.
highlights: Led the company's home page modernization for UK customers.
Led the development of high-load session authentication microservices.
Led the development of DCI-PSS (cardholder data) compliant services.
Led improvements on customer journey for first-time depositing users.
Led the development of GraphQL gateway service layer unifying multiple Java backends.

work.summary: Focused on research and development with team management responsibilities for one of the biggest EPAM's client in EU/US.
highlights: Certified technical interviewer.
Member of JavaScript Experts Internal Assessment Committee.
Developed Voice User Interfaces (Google Home, Alexa) for integration with our client's products.
Led a distributed team with focus on building UI web components library.
Public speaking: Voice User Interfaces (Barka, Kraków, June 2018).

work.summary: Senior Software Engineer with focus on research and development of UI libraries.
highlights: Developed custom UI web components using TypeScript.
Developed custom UI components using Angular and wrapping existing web components.
Developed custom UI component styles in a modular and highly reusable approach using SASS.
Public speaking: Web Components (Barka, Kraków, 2017).
Public speaking: Web Components (Sztuka Wyboru, Gdańsk, 2017).

work.summary: Worked on a project for Walt Disney Parks & Resorts, one of the oldest and biggest accounts on the company, migrating from an legacy PHP based platform to AngularJS & Node.js
highlights: Developed critical UI components as AngularJS directives. They had to be generic enough to be used across several business verticals.
Improved performance on several UI components by the reduction of watchers, replacing them with the proper use of ng-model controller on directives.
Improved performance on several UI components by reducing the amount of unnecessary two-way-bindings, replacing them with one-time-bindings.
Integrated several REST API services through AngularJS services and factories.

work.summary: Worked at BHP Global on a internal product based on the MEAN stack: MongoDB, Express, AngularJS & Node.js
highlights: Public speaking: HipChat integrations (Buenos Aires, 2014).
Developed a REST API backend from ground zero, using Node.js and MongoDB, with JWToken authentication.
Fully integrated with JIRA project management tool through JIRA's REST API.
Responsive & mobile friendly admin panel built from ground zero with Twitter's Bootstrap framework.

work.summary: Worked at Itexa S.R.L. on several projects built on the LAMP stack: Linux, Apache, MySQL & PHP. Involved technologies were the CodeIgniter PHP framework, jQuery & Bootstrap.
highlights: Fully developed a medium sized learning management system for the Alliance Française.
Developed a full-fledged accounting system for schools on a team composed by 3 people. I remember this team as the perfect MVC team.
Developed an entire corporate newsletter web application for ESET Latin America.

work.summary: Worked at BHP Global on an integration project between two project management tools, JIRA & TestLink, for the Q&A area of Banco Hipotecario S.A.
highlights: Extended TestLink API capabilities.
Built a middleware architecture to manage the comunication between tools: TestLink XML-RPC <=> JIRA REST
Extended TestLink reporting capabilities.

work.summary: Worked together with ISRI (a private tech-related education center) to bring new topics to the classrooms in order to achieve innovation goals.
highlights: Cisco CCNA I Instructor
Cisco CCNA II Instructor
Cisco CCNA III Instructor
Cisco CCNA IV Instructor
Mikrotik RouterOS Instructor
Introduction to CodeIgniter Instructor

work.summary: Worked at Interredes S.A., a San Juan based ISP provider, from Tech Support to Network Services Manager, and on many different projects.
highlights: Implemented Interredes first BGP Autonomous System within a 3 people team.
Replaced old MS DNS server with a Linux MySQL backed PowerDNS server.
Built a virtual hosting service with PHP scripting & MySQL capabilities.
Developed an internal support ticket system with client connection diagnostic capabilities to improve the support response time.

references.name: Vadzim Yakushau, Lead Software Engineer, EPAM Systems
references.reference: Ricardo is technically skilled, team builder, coach and mentor. I've had this chance and enjoyed working with Ricardo the last 2 years at EPAM. Keep the good work!

references.name: Ernesto Corona, CEO, BHP Global
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Ricardo, his performance working as a consultant for BHP Global proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

references.name: Martín Fonzo, CEO, Communi Technologies
references.reference: Ricardo is a team player, detail-oriented person who's always looking for new challenges, committed to the projects he works on. It is always a pleasure to work with him.
